questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and architecture
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A detailed architectural feature

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A gargoyle
C) A person
D) A painting

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A human figure
B) An animal statue
C) A flower
D) A vehicle

What is depicted in the foreground?
A) A garden
B) A stone structure
C) A water body
D) A road

What is depicted in the background?
A) A mountain range
B) The sky
C) A forest
D) An ocean

What animal does the statue resemble?
A) A lion
B) A horse
C) An eagle
D) A fish

What is the texture of the central object?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Glossy
D) Soft

What is the color of the central object?
A) Green
B) Blue
C) Brown
D) Red

What is the posture of the animal statue?
A) Sitting
B) Standing
C) Leaping forward
D) Lying down

What kind of detail is present on the building's structure?
A) Simple and plain
B) Intricate and ornate
C) Minimalistic
D) Abstract

What is the likely material of the building?
A) Wood
B) Glass
C) Stone
D) Metal

What kind of artistic style does the statue represent?
A) Realistic
B) Abstract
C) Surreal
D) Impressionistic

What is the angle of the photo?
A) From above
B) From below
C) Straight on
D) From the side

What is the perspective of the photo?
A) Close-up
B) Wide-angle
C) Mid-range
D) Panoramic

A) Simple and crude
B) Detailed and skilled
C) Mass-produced
D) Technologically advanced

What is the orientation of the animal statue?
A) Facing left
B) Facing right
C) Facing forward
D) Facing backward

What additional architectural features are visible in the photo?
A) Windows
B) Doors
C) Decorative carvings
D) Balconies

What is the relationship between the statue and the building?
A) The statue is a separate entity
B) The statue is integrated into the building's architecture
C) The statue is placed on the ground near the building
D) The statue is hanging from the building

What is the primary color of the building's facade?
A) White
B) Red
C) Blue
D) Yellow

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A forest
B) The sky
C) A busy street
D) A river

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A flower bed
B) A close-up of a wall
C) A car
